General.Name: Meridia Real Estate III Socimi SA
General.Description: Meridia Real Estate III, SOCIMI, S.A. operates as a real estate investment company in Spain. It has investments in active real estate projects located in Madrid and Barcelona. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.
